name: One Slice Left
description:
As you come back from a tiring day of work, you discover that the pizza that has been ordered for you as been already eaten ! Why, how, and most importantly...

Who ? 

Interrogate your roomates to find out the truth !

One Slice Left was produced in a two weeks workshop at E-Art sup Bordeaux. It was the first video game project we really got to make as a team assignement in our first year.
